item.nzh-sem:metakeywords: Business, Fuel Prices, Oil and Gas
item.title: More pain at the pump: Motorists face another tax hike from tomorrow
item.description:
Motorists will from tomorrow pay an additional 4 cents per litre to fill up their tanks.
This comes as the Government's annual fuel excise tax takes effect.
This is the third consecutive year of increases ...
